text: Me tavohe Eliab, i tuei Devet togagi, mo rongoe mo gato lawe na tangaloi, mo vaie Eliab a merona mo mwere na avi mo mui su lawe Devet. Me mo hui vena, “Huri na havagi gom himei talehe? Me gu teu na sibsib wewerigi ngerehi lawe hine lolo vanue vurogi? Nau iloe mwere hilogo a nomu sagesage mena domimu hinge asigi; gom vumai hogosie hurive gon leo vuro.”
